class.name: SolvePseudoInverseQrp

javadoc.text: * A pseudo inverse solver for a generic QR column pivot decomposition algorithm. See{@link BaseLinearSolverQrp} for technical details on the algorithm. *
javadoc.author: Peter Abeles

javadoc.param: norm2Solution If true the basic solution will be returned, false the minimal 2-norm solution.

method.name: solve
method.comment: get the pivots and transpose them
solve each column one by one
make a copy of this column in the vector
solve for Rx = b using the standard upper triangular solver
finish the basic solution by filling in zeros
